newsitem.title: POLAND: NFI units trade on kerb at PLN 148.
newsitem.headline: NFI units trade on kerb at PLN 148.

text.p: A kerb transaction in 53,500 mass privatisation NFI units at 148 zlotys was struck on the Warsaw bourse on Wednesday, the bourse said in a statement.
At the regular session, NFI units rose 3.3 percent to 139 zlotys in 30,562 share volume.
